Headline: Updated: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute at Broadway/Wellington
ShortDescription: 36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Halsted, Belmont and Broadway: due to, street blockage near Broadway/Wellington.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Halsted, Belmont and Broadway: due to, street blockage near Broadway/Wellington.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Cottage Grove
ShortDescription: 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, Cottage Grove, 61st, King Drive and 63rd due to street blockage near 63rd/Cottage Grove.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 63rd, Cottage Grove, 61st, King Drive and 63rd due to street blockage near 63rd/Cottage Grove.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Clark/Division. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Clark/Division.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
